Posted By: Lotsofpoopy (9/2/2012 1:30:03 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Red isn't the Big Creature colour, so when there's a green creature with the same p/t but ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol) cheaper, I can't say, "STRICTLY BETTER LOL"  
  
3 toughness in a more instant/sorcery colour is decent, because you now have a dangerous wall: one that can, in turn, destroy a dangerous creature without using a burn-spell.  
  
Mund you, red limited in M13 isn't burny enough, unlike M12.   
  
I do miss [Blood Orge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blood Orge), though....
posts.html:
Red isn't the Big Creature colour, so when there's a green creature with the same p/t but cheaper, I can't say, "STRICTLY BETTER LOL"

Mund you, red limited in M13 isn't burny enough, unlike M12.

Posted By: Ferlord (1/8/2013 12:16:11 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
**I hate draft fillers, with a passion.** Stop being **cowards** and increase the power level of your junk cards!!! Nobody likes to see terrible cards, but you make them every set!  
  
Obviously there has to be "the strongest", and "the weakest", but you dont even try to balance the weak cards!! Its like a slap in the face!!   
  
 "Hahaaaa, have a [hill giant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=hill giant), or a [razor boomerang](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=razor boomerang), or even a [mindless null](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=mindless null). You payed 4 dollars for that booster, remember?"   
  
You pretend that junk garbage somehow "slows down powercreep", but even urza and mirrodin had its junk cards.. THE BLOCK DIDNT GET SLOWED DOWN.....  
  
The weakest cards don't define powercreep, the strongest ones do. So tone down the stronger end, and give the weaker end a buff. Nobody wants too see unplayable trashshit in there booster packs you noobass developers.  
  
/endrant.
posts.html:
I hate draft fillers, with a passion. Stop being cowards and increase the power level of your junk cards!!! Nobody likes to see terrible cards, but you make them every set!

Obviously there has to be "the strongest", and "the weakest", but you dont even try to balance the weak cards!! Its like a slap in the face!!

"Hahaaaa, have a hill giant, or a razor boomerang, or even a mindless null. You payed 4 dollars for that booster, remember?"

You pretend that junk garbage somehow "slows down powercreep", but even urza and mirrodin had its junk cards.. THE BLOCK DIDNT GET SLOWED DOWN.....

The weakest cards don't define powercreep, the strongest ones do. So tone down the stronger end, and give the weaker end a buff. Nobody wants too see unplayable trashshit in there booster packs you noobass developers.

/endrant.
